attributes.action: Ensure the Post Office Card Account 2 (POCA2) remains with The Post Office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the Post Office loses this account to Pay Point or some other private organisation, further Post Office closures on top of those under threat at the moment, will be inevitable, placing vulnerable groups, whom the Government claim to be concerned for, under further stress and inconvenience
